mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.name AS "name", a.model AS "model", a.capacity_model AS "capacityModel", a.price AS "price", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.amount AS "amount", a.total_price AS "totalPrice", a.classify_id AS "classifyId", a.power AS "power", a.place AS "place", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.unit AS "unit", a.product_type AS "productType", a.position AS "position", a.floor AS "floor", a.demand_area AS "demandArea", a.descript AS "descript", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", dkContract.name AS "dkContract.name", a.contract_id AS "dkContract.id"
LEFT JOIN dk_contract dkContract ON dkContract.id = a.contract_id LEFT JOIN sys_user saleUser ON saleUser.id = dkContract.sale_by LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = saleUser.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_contract_product( id, contract_id, product_id, name, model, capacity_model, price, cost_price, amount, total_price, classify_id, power, place, brand_id, unit, product_type, position, floor, demand_area, descript, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractId}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{model}, #{capacityModel}, #{price}, #{costPrice}, #{amount}, #{totalPrice}, #{classifyId}, #{power}, #{place}, #{brandId}, #{unit}, #{productType}, #{position}, #{floor}, #{demandArea}, #{descript}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_contract_product SET contract_id = #{contractId}, product_id = #{productId}, name = #{name}, model = #{model}, capacity_model = #{capacityModel}, price = #{price}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, amount = #{amount}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, classify_id = #{classifyId}, power = #{power}, place = #{place}, brand_id = #{brandId}, unit = #{unit}, product_type = #{productType}, position = #{position}, floor = #{floor}, demand_area = #{demandArea}, descript = #{descript}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_contract_product( id, contract_id, product_id, name, model, price, cost_price, amount, total_price, classify_id, power, place, brand_id, unit, product_type, position, floor, demand_area, capacity_model, descript, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) select REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{id}, product_id, name, model, price, cost_price, amount, total_price, classify_id, power, place, brand_id, unit, product_type, position, floor, demand_area, capacity_model, descript, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} from dk_quotation_product where quotation_id = #{dkQuotation.id}
